verbose_text: In vivo studies showed that (i) TLR3 as well as MDA5 knockdown reduced poly (I : C)-mediated immune response and antiviral activity to significant extents; (ii) when Myd88 was overexpressed in flounder, poly (I : C)-mediated antiviral activity was significantly decreased; (iii) when Myd88 was inactivated, the antiviral effect of poly (I : C) was significantly increased.
